import React from "react"; import { Badge, DropdownMenu, DropdownItem, UncontrolledDropdown, DropdownToggle, Media, Table, } from "reactstrap"; const Tables = ({ user_data, toggleModal, setVisible, visible, setName, setPhone, setUserId }) => { toggleModal = (item) => { setUserId(item?._id) setName(item?.name) setPhone(item?.mobile) setVisible(!visible); }; return ( <> { user_data?.map((item) => { return ( ) }) }
Name mobile Status Action
{item?.name} {item?.mobile} {item?.status} e.preventDefault()} > e.preventDefault()} > Delete toggleModal(item)} > Edit
); }; export default Tables;
